ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile.
Unlocked Quad-Band cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and 3G 850/1900/2100 plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities
2 MP camera with video recording QCIF@15fps; Stereo Bluetooth with A2DP; SMS, EMS, MMS, Email; Fitness applications; Pedometer; Stopwatch and Push-to-Talk.
MP3/AAC+ player; MotoID music recognition; FM radio; W.AP 2.0/xHTML; motion-based games; miniUSB connector; Accelerometer sensor; Turn-to-mute; Gesture control and microSD slot up to 8GB
Up to 8 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours of standby time.
Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola W7 Unlocked Quad-Band Phone with 2MP Camera, MP3, FM Radio, Bluetooth and MicroSD Slot--International version with Warranty (White)
